RoomFactory - Class in mansionBandit.factory

RoomPainter - Class in mansionBandit.factory
The RoomPainter will apply wall, floor, and ceiling textures to a room reads a list of defined paint templates, and chooses one at random for each room

roomView - Variable in class mansionBandit.gameView.GamePanel
 
RoomView - Class in mansionBandit.gameView
RoomView contains all objects and information required to draw a view of a single room on the screen By default the room will be rendered as if it is directly in front of the viewer, with the viewer standing flat against the back wall.
RoomView(String, MansionArea, Face, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class mansionBandit.gameView.RoomView
constructor constructs the Surfaces from the given room, and stores the rooms bounds
RoomView(MansionArea, Face, int, int, int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class mansionBandit.gameView.RoomView
special constructor is the same as the standard one, except it creates a modified RoomView designed to handle hallways that branch off of a straight hallway (a side passage)
